release.change: The app will tell you if the server is outdated
If app is in Swedish it will look at boktipset.se before checking Google Books if the server has no book description
Added a classic theme to bring back the old Booksonic design
Sleeptimer will reset if you shake the phone
Server and account info can be included in import/export
Heard status can now be imported/exported
Keeping track of played tracks should be much more reliable.
The app keeps track of what you have listened to
Improved tablet dual pane behavior (DSub update)
Some of the new feautures requires server update to Booksonic 1.0 Beta1 or newer
